name: Lost in Aaramit
description:
Somewhere, very far away from here, a spaceship has just fallen to Aaramit, a mysterious planet of an undiscovered galaxy, for apparent no reasons. You will play as the captain of the ship,Allen, a young and silent boy, and you will be always followed by his little assistant, Kitchi, in order to recover from the disaster and to find out a solution: you will definitely need to get some fuel and components for the spaceship in order to come back to space and continue the route home. Luckily, you’ll soon find out that the planet is not deserted or uninhabited at all: the little minions are kind, gentle and friendly. So, you will start exploring the planet, solving puzzles, facing challenges; you will pass through labyrinths and you will deal with gears, levers and machines. You will walk across beautiful landscapes too. If you manage to become friends with the habitants, you will learn the secrets of Aaramit and eventually get information about the precious treasures hidden around.

Lost in Aaramit  is a puzzle/platform game developed for the Videogame Design and Programming course, Dipartimento di Elettronica, Informazione e Bioingegneria, Politecnico di Milano
